title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Indirect Simulation for Intellectual Disability Awareness and Inclusive Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Present at least three case studies explaining the characteristics and educational needs of individuals with intellectual disabilities
Experientially understand the daily challenges of students with intellectual disabilities through indirect simulation activities and propose inclusive lesson design plans based on this understanding
Develop peer support and communication strategies during collaborative learning tasks and produce PBL outcomes (e.g., lesson plans, activity materials) reflecting these strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
